content.name: real_closed_interval
content.prop: real_closed_interval a b = {p. less_eq a p & less_eq p b}

content.name: real_open_interval
content.prop: real_open_interval a b = {p. less a p & less p b}

content.name: integrable_on
content.prop: integrable_on f i = ?y. has_integral f y i

content.name: integral
content.prop: integral i f = THE y. has_integral f y i

content.name: integrable_integral
content.prop: integrable_on f i --> has_integral f (integral i f) i

content.name: has_integral_integrable

proof.th: has_integral f i s ⊢ has_integral f i s

proof.args: exI, {a: real}, {P: λy. has_integral f y s, a: i}
proof.th: has_integral f i s ⊢ ∃a. has_integral f a s
has_integral f i s ⊢ integrable_on f s
⊢ has_integral f i s ⟶ integrable_on f s

content.prop: has_integral f i s --> integrable_on f s

content.name: has_integral_integral

proof.th: ⊢ integrable_on f s ⟶ has_integral f (integral s f) s
integrable_on f s ⊢ integrable_on f s
integrable_on f s ⊢ has_integral f (integral s f) s
⊢ integrable_on f s ⟶ has_integral f (integral s f) s
⊢ has_integral f (integral s f) s ⟶ integrable_on f s
has_integral f (integral s f) s ⊢ has_integral f (integral s f) s

proof.args: exI, {a: real}, {P: λa. has_integral f a s, a: integral s f}
proof.th: has_integral f (integral s f) s ⊢ ∃a. has_integral f a s
has_integral f (integral s f) s ⊢ integrable_on f s
⊢ has_integral f (integral s f) s ⟶ integrable_on f s
⊢ integrable_on f s ⟷ has_integral f (integral s f) s

content.prop: integrable_on f s = has_integral f (integral s f) s

content.name: has_integral_unique
content.prop: has_integral f k1 i & has_integral f k2 i --> k1 = k2

content.name: integral_unique
content.prop: has_integral f y k --> integral k f = y

content.name: has_integral_integrable_integral
content.prop: has_integral f i s = (integrable_on f s & integral s f = i)

content.name: integral_eq_has_integral
content.prop: integrable_on f s --> ((integral s f = y) = has_integral f y s)

content.name: has_integral_is_0
content.prop: (!x. member x s --> f x = 0) --> has_integral f 0 s

content.name: has_integral_0

proof.th: ⊢ _VAR x
x ∈ s ⊢ x ∈ s
⊢ has_integral (λx. 0) 0 s

content.prop: has_integral (%x. 0) 0 s

content.name: has_integral_0_eq
content.prop: has_integral (%x. 0) i s = (i = 0)

content.name: has_integral_cmul
content.prop: has_integral f k s --> has_integral (%x. c * f x) (c * k) s

content.name: has_integral_neg
content.prop: has_integral f k s --> has_integral (%x. -(f x)) (-k) s

content.name: has_integral_add
content.prop: has_integral f k s & has_integral g l s --> has_integral (%x. f x + g x) (k + l) s

content.name: has_integral_sub
content.prop: has_integral f k s & has_integral g l s --> has_integral (%x. f x - g x) (k - l) s

content.name: integral_0
content.prop: integral s (%x. 0) = 0

content.name: integral_add
content.prop: integrable_on f s & integrable_on g s --> integral s (%x. f x + g x) = integral s f + integral s g

content.name: integral_cmul
content.prop: integrable_on f s --> integral s (%x. c * (f x)) = c * integral s f

content.name: integral_neg
content.prop: integrable_on f s --> integral s (%x. -(f x)) = - integral s f

content.name: integral_sub
content.prop: integrable_on f s & integrable_on g s --> integral s (%x. f x - g x) = integral s f - integral s g

content.name: integrable_0
content.prop: integrable_on (%x. 0) s

content.name: integrable_add
content.prop: integrable_on f s & integrable_on g s --> integrable_on (%x. f x + g x) s

content.name: integrable_cmul
content.prop: integrable_on f s --> integrable_on (%x. c * (f x)) s

content.name: integrable_cmul_eq
content.prop: integrable_on (%x. c * (f x)) s = ((c = 0) | integrable_on f s)

content.name: integrable_neg
content.prop: integrable_on f s --> integrable_on (%x. -(f x)) s

content.name: integrable_neg_eq
content.prop: integrable_on (%x. -(f x)) s = integrable_on f s

content.name: integrable_sub
content.prop: integrable_on f s & integrable_on g s --> integrable_on (%x. f x - g x) s

content.name: has_integral_eq
content.prop: (!x. member x s --> f x = g x) & has_integral f k s --> has_integral g k s

content.name: integrable_eq
content.prop: (!x. member x s --> f x = g x) & integrable_on f s --> integrable_on g s

content.name: has_integral_eq_eq
content.prop: (!x. member x s --> f x = g x) --> (has_integral f k s = has_integral g k s)

content.name: has_integral_null
content.prop: (a = b) --> has_integral f 0 (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: has_integral_null_eq
content.prop: (a = b) --> (has_integral f i (real_closed_interval a b) = (i = 0))

content.name: integral_null
content.prop: (a = b) --> integral (real_closed_interval a b) f = 0

content.name: integrable_on_null
content.prop: (a = b) --> integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: has_integral_empty
content.prop: has_integral f 0 (empty_set:: real set)

content.name: has_integral_empty_eq
content.prop: has_integral f i (empty_set:: real set) = (i = 0)

content.name: integrable_on_empty
content.prop: integrable_on f (empty_set:: real set)

content.name: integral_empty
content.prop: integral (empty_set:: real set) f = 0

content.name: has_integral_refl
content.prop: has_integral f 0 (real_closed_interval a a)

content.name: integrable_on_refl
content.prop: integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a a)

content.name: integral_refl
content.prop: integral (real_closed_interval a a) f = 0

content.name: interval_split_l
content.prop: inter (real_closed_interval a b) {x. x <= c} = real_closed_interval a (min b c)

content.name: interval_split_r
content.prop: inter (real_closed_interval a b) {x. x >= c} = real_closed_interval (max a c) b

content.name: has_ingegral_split
content.prop: has_integral f i (inter (real_closed_interval a b) {x. x <= c}) & has_integral f j (inter (real_closed_interval a b) {x. x >= c}) --> has_integral f (i + j) (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: integrable_split
content.prop: integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a b) --> integrable_on f (inter (real_closed_interval a b) {x. x <= c}) & integrable_on f (inter (real_closed_interval a b) {x. x >= c})

content.name: has_integral_const
content.prop: has_integral (%x. c) (c * (b -a)) (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: integrable_const
content.prop: integrable_on (%x. c) (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: integral_const
content.prop: integral (real_closed_interval a b) (%x. c) = c * (b -a)

content.name: has_integral_le
content.prop: has_integral f i s & has_integral g j s & (!x. member x s --> f x <= g x) --> i <= j

content.name: integral_le
content.prop: integrable_on f s & integrable_on g s & (!x. member x s --> f x <= g x) --> integral s f <= integral s g

content.name: has_integral_pos
content.prop: has_integral f i s & (!x. member x s --> 0 <= f x) --> 0 <= i

content.name: integral_pos
content.prop: integrable_on f s & (!x. member x s --> 0 <= f x) --> 0 <= integral s f

content.name: has_integral_neg0
content.prop: has_integral f i s & (!x. member x s --> f x <= 0) --> i <= 0

content.name: has_integral_lbound
content.prop: has_integral f i (real_closed_interval a b) & (!x. member x (real_closed_interval a b) --> B <= f x) --> B * (b - a) <= i

content.name: has_integral_ubound
content.prop: has_integral f i (real_closed_interval a b) & (!x. member x (real_closed_interval a b) --> f x <= B) --> i <= B * (b - a)

content.name: integral_lbound
content.prop: integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a b) & (!x. member x (real_closed_interval a b) --> B <= f x) --> B * (b - a) <= integral (real_closed_interval a b) f

content.name: integral_ubound
content.prop: integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a b) & (!x. member x (real_closed_interval a b) --> f x <= B) --> integral (real_closed_interval a b) f <= B * (b - a)

content.name: integrable_uniform_limit
content.prop: (!e. 0 < e --> ?g. (!x. member x (real_closed_interval a b) --> abs(f x - g x) <= e) & integrable_on g (real_closed_interval a b)) --> integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: indicator
content.prop: indicator s = (λx. if x ∈ s then 1 else 0)

content.name: negligible
content.prop: negligible s = !a. !b. has_integral (indicator s) 0 (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: has_integral_negligible
content.prop: negligible s & (!x. member x (diff t s) --> f x = 0) --> has_integral f 0 t

content.name: has_integral_on_negligible
content.prop: negligible s --> has_integral f 0 s

content.name: integrable_on_negligible
content.prop: negligible s --> integrable_on f s

content.name: integral_on_negligible
content.prop: negligible s --> integral s f = 0

content.name: has_integral_spike
content.prop: negligible s & (!x. member x (diff t s) --> f x = g x) & has_integral f y t --> has_integral g y t

content.name: has_integral_spike_eq
content.prop: negligible s & (!x. member x (diff t s) --> f x = g x) --> (has_integral f y t = has_integral g y t)

content.name: integrable_spike
content.prop: negligible s & (!x. member x (diff t s) --> f x = g x) & integrable_on f t --> integrable_on g t

content.name: integrable_spike_eq
content.prop: negligible s & (!x. member x (diff t s) --> f x = g x) --> (integrable_on f t = integrable_on g t)

content.name: integral_spike
content.prop: negligible s & (!x. member x (diff t s) --> f x = g x) --> (integral t f = integral t g)

content.name: negligible_subset
content.prop: negligible s & subset t s --> negligible t

content.name: negligible_diff
content.prop: negligible s --> negligible (diff s t)

content.name: negligible_inter
content.prop: negligible s | negligible t --> negligible (inter s t)

content.name: negligible_union
content.prop: negligible s & negligible t --> negligible (union s t)

content.name: negligible_union_eq
content.prop: negligible (union s t) <--> negligible s & negligible t

content.name: negligible_sing
content.prop: negligible {a}

content.name: negligible_insert
content.prop: negligible (insert a s) = negligible s

content.name: negligible_empty
content.prop: negligible empty_set

content.name: negligible_finite
content.prop: finite s --> negligible s

content.name: negligible_Union
content.prop: finite s & (!t. member t s --> negligible t) --> negligible (Union s)

content.name: NEGLIGIBLE
content.prop: negligible s = !t. has_integral (indicator s) 0 t

content.name: has_integral_spike_finite
content.prop: finite s & (!x. member x (diff t s) --> g x = f x) & has_integral f y t --> has_integral g y t

content.name: has_integral_spike_finite_eq
content.prop: finite s & (!x. member x (diff t s) --> g x = f x) --> (has_integral f y t = has_integral g y t)

content.name: integrable_spike_finite
content.prop: finite s & (!x. member x (diff t s) --> g x = f x) & integrable_on f t --> integrable_on g t

content.name: integral_eq
content.prop: (!x. member x s --> g x = f x) --> (integral s f = integral s g)

content.name: integral_eq_0
content.prop: (!x. member x s --> f x = 0) --> (integral s f = 0)

content.name: negligible_frontier_interval
content.prop: negligible (diff (real_closed_interval a b) (real_open_interval a b))

content.name: has_integral_spike_interior
content.prop: (!x. member x (real_open_interval a b) --> g x = f x) & has_integral f y (real_closed_interval a b) --> has_integral g y (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: has_integral_spike_interior_eq
content.prop: (!x. member x (real_open_interval a b) --> g x = f x) --> has_integral f y (real_closed_interval a b) = has_integral g y (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: integrable_spike_interior
content.prop: (!x. member x (real_open_interval a b) --> g x = f x) --> integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a b) --> integrable_on g (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: integrable_continuous
content.prop: continuous_on f (real_closed_interval a b) --> integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: integrable_subinterval
content.prop: integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a b) & subset (real_closed_interval c d) (real_closed_interval a b) --> integrable_on f (real_closed_interval c d)

content.name: has_integral_combine
content.prop: a <= c & c <= b & has_integral f i (real_closed_interval a c) & has_integral f j (real_closed_interval c b) --> has_integral f (i + j) (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: integral_combine
content.prop: a <= c & c <= b & integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a b) --> integral (real_closed_interval a c) f + integral (real_closed_interval c b) f = integral (real_closed_interval a b) f

content.name: integrable_combine
content.prop: a <= c & c <= b & integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a c) & integrable_on f (real_closed_interval c b) --> integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: integral_has_v_derivative_pointwise
content.prop: integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a b) & member x (real_closed_interval a b) & continuous f (within (at x) (real_closed_interval a b)) --> has_v_derivative (%u. integral (real_closed_interval a u) f) (f x) (within (at x) (real_closed_interval a b))

content.name: integral_has_v_derivative
content.prop: continuous_on f (real_closed_interval a b) --> !x. member x (real_closed_interval a b) --> has_v_derivative (%u. integral (real_closed_interval a u) f) (f x) (within (at x) (real_closed_interval a b))

content.name: antiderivative_continuous
content.prop: continuous_on f (real_closed_interval a b) --> ?g. !x. member x (real_closed_interval a b) --> has_v_derivative g (f x) (within (at x) (real_closed_interval a b))

content.name: has_integral_restrict_open_subinterval
content.prop: has_integral f i (real_closed_interval c d) & subset (real_closed_interval c d) (real_closed_interval a b) --> has_integral (%x. if member x (real_open_interval c d) then f x else 0) i (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: has_integral_restrict_closed_subinterval
content.prop: has_integral f i (real_closed_interval c d) & subset (real_closed_interval c d) (real_closed_interval a b) --> has_integral (%x. if member x (real_closed_interval c d) then f x else 0) i (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: has_integral_restrict_closed_subinterval_eq
content.prop: subset (real_closed_interval c d) (real_closed_interval a b) --> (has_integral (%x. if member x (real_closed_interval c d) then f x else 0) i (real_closed_interval a b) = has_integral f i (real_closed_interval c d))

content.name: has_integral_restrict
content.prop: subset s t --> (has_integral (%x. if member x s then f x else 0) i t = has_integral f i s)

content.name: integral_restrict
content.prop: subset s t --> (integral t (%x. if member x s then f x else 0) = integral s f)

content.name: integrable_restrict
content.prop: subset s t --> (integrable_on (%x. if member x s then f x else 0) t = integrable_on f s)

content.name: has_integral_restrict_univ
content.prop: has_integral (%x. if member x s then f x else 0) i univ = has_integral f i s

content.name: integral_restrict_univ
content.prop: integral univ (%x. if member x s then f x else 0) = integral s f

content.name: integrable_restrict_univ
content.prop: integrable_on (%x. if member x s then f x else 0) univ = integrable_on f s

content.name: has_integral_restrict_inter
content.prop: has_integral (%x. if member x s then f x else 0) i t = has_integral f i (inter s t)

content.name: integral_restrict_inter
content.prop: integral t (%x. if member x s then f x else 0) = integral (inter s t) f

content.name: integrable_restrict_inter
content.prop: integrable_on (%x. if member x s then f x else 0) t = integrable_on f (inter s t)

content.name: has_integral_on_superset
content.prop: (!x. neg (member x s) --> f x = 0) & subset s t & has_integral f i s --> has_integral f i t

content.name: integrable_on_superset
content.prop: (!x. neg (member x s) --> f x = 0) & subset s t & integrable_on f s --> integrable_on f t

content.name: negligible_on_intervals
content.prop: negligible s = !a. !b. negligible (inter s (real_closed_interval a b))

content.name: has_integral_reflect_lemma
content.prop: has_integral f i (real_closed_interval a b) --> has_integral (%x. f (-x)) i (real_closed_interval (-b) (-a))

content.name: has_integral_reflect
content.prop: has_integral (%x. f (-x)) i (real_closed_interval (-b) (-a)) = has_integral f i (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: integrable_reflect
content.prop: integrable_on (%x. f (-x)) (real_closed_interval (-b) (-a)) = integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: integral_reflect
content.prop: integral (real_closed_interval (-b) (-a)) (%x. f (-x)) = integral (real_closed_interval a b) f

content.name: has_integral_translation
content.prop: has_integral (%x. f (a + x)) i s = has_integral f i (image (%x. a + x) s)

content.name: integral_translation
content.prop: integral s (%x. f (a + x)) = integral (image (%x. a + x) s) f

content.name: integrable_translation
content.prop: integrable_on (%x. f (a + x)) s = integrable_on f (image (%x. a + x) s)

content.name: has_integral_pos_ae
content.prop: has_integral f i s & negligible t & (!x. member x (diff s t) --> 0 <= f x) --> 0 <= i

content.name: integral_pos_ae
content.prop: integrable_on f s & negligible t & (!x. member x (diff s t) --> 0 <= f x) --> 0 <= integral s f

content.name: has_integral_subset_le
content.prop: subset s t & has_integral f i s & has_integral f j t & (!x. member x t --> 0 <= f x) --> i <= j

content.name: integral_subset_le
content.prop: subset s t & integrable_on f s & integrable_on f t & (!x. member x t --> 0 <= f x) --> integral s f <= integral t f

content.name: integrable_on_subinterval
content.prop: integrable_on f s & subset (real_closed_interval a b) s --> integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: integral_split
content.prop: integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a b) --> integral (real_closed_interval a b) f = integral (real_closed_interval a (min b t)) f + integral (real_closed_interval (max a t) b) f

content.name: integral_split_signed
content.prop: a <= t & a <= b & integrable_on f (real_closed_interval a (max b t)) --> integral (real_closed_interval a b) f = integral (real_closed_interval a t) f + (if b < t then -1 else 1) * integral (real_closed_interval (min b t) (max b t)) f

content.name: integrable_reflect_gen
content.prop: integrable_on (%x. f (-x)) s = integrable_on f (image uminus s)

content.name: integral_reflect_gen
content.prop: integral s (%x. f (-x)) = integral (image uminus s) f

content.name: has_integral_straddle_null
content.prop: (!x. member x s --> 0 <= f x & f x <= g x) & has_integral g 0 s --> has_integral f 0 s

content.name: has_integral_diff
content.prop: has_integral f i s & has_integral f j t & negligible (diff t s) --> has_integral f (i - j) (diff s t)

content.name: integral_diff
content.prop: integrable_on f s & integrable_on f t & negligible (diff t s) --> integral (diff s t) f = integral s f - integral t f

content.name: integrable_diff
content.prop: integrable_on f s & integrable_on f t & subset t s --> integrable_on f (diff s t)

content.name: interval_image_affinity_interval
content.prop: ?u. ?v. image (%x. m * x + c) (real_closed_interval a b) = (real_closed_interval u v)

content.name: integration_by_parts
prop: has_integral (%x. (f x) * (g2 x)) ((f b) * (g b) - (f a) * (g a) - y) (real_closed_interval a b)
--> has_integral (%x. (f2 x) * (g x)) y (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: integration_by_parts_simple
prop: --> has_v_derivative f (f2 x) (within (at x) (real_closed_interval a b)) &
has_v_derivative g (g2 x) (within (at x) (real_closed_interval a b))) &
has_integral (%x. (f x) * (g2 x)) ((f b) * (g b) - (f a) * (g a) - y) (real_closed_interval a b)
--> has_integral (%x. (f2 x) * (g x)) y (real_closed_interval a b)

content.name: has_integral_subsitution
prop: image g (real_closed_interval a b) ⊆ real_closed_interval c d ∧
has_v_derivative g (g2 x) (within (at x) (real_closed_interval a b)) ∧
a ≤ b ∧ c ≤ d ∧ g a ≤ g b ⟶
